GAL 5.25 jabai libam ahmin, ahmin jah gaggam.
GAL 5.26 ni wairþaima flautai, uns misso ushaitandans, misso in neiþa wisandans.
GAL 6.1 Broþrjus, jabai gafahaidau manna in ƕizai missadede, jus þai ahmeinans gaþwastjaiþ þana swaleikana in ahmin qairreins, andsaiƕands þuk silban, iba jah þu fraisaizau.
GAL 6.2 izwaros misso kauriþos bairaiþ, jah swa usfulleiþ witoþ Xristaus.
GAL 6.3 iþ jabai þugkeiþ ƕas ƕa wisan, ni waiht wisands, sis silbin fraþjamarzeins ist.
GAL 6.4 iþ waurstw sein silbins kiusai ƕarjizuh, jah þan in sis silbin ƕoftulja habai jah ni in anþaramma;
GAL 6.5 ƕarjizuh auk swesa baurþein bairiþ.
GAL 6.6 aþþan gamainjai sa laisida waurda þamma laisjandin in allaim godaim is.
manna auk þatei saijiþ þata jah sneiþiþ.
GAL 6.8 unte saei saijiþ in leika seinamma, us þamma leika jah sneiþiþ riurein;
iþ saei saijiþ in ahmin, us ahmin jah sneiþiþ libain aiweinon.
GAL 6.9 aþþan þata godo taujandans ni wairþaima usgrudjans;
unte at mel swesata sneiþam ni afmauidai.
GAL 6.10 þannu nu, þandei mel habam, waurkjam þiuþ wiþra allans, þishun wiþra swesans galaubeinai.
GAL 6.11 sai, ƕileikaim bokom gamelida izwis meinai handau.
GAL 6.12 swa managai swe wileina samjan sis in leika, þai nauþjand izwis bimaitan, ei ƕeh wrakja galgins Xristaus ni winnaina.
GAL 6.13 niþþan sweþauh þai ize bimaitanai sind, witoþ fastand, ak wileina izwis bimaitan, ei in izwaramma leika ƕopaina.
GAL 6.14 iþ mis ni sijai ƕopan ni in waihtai, niba in galgins fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus, þairh þanei mis fairƕus ushramiþs ist jah ik fairƕau.
GAL 6.15 unte ni bimait waiht ist, nih faurafilli, ak niuja gaskafts.
GAL 6.16 jah swa managai swe þizai garaideinai galaistans sind, gawairþi ana im jah armaio jah ana Israela gudis.
GAL 6.17 þanamais arbaide ni ainshun mis gansjai:
unte ik stakins Iesuis ana leika meinamma baira.
GAL 6.18 ansts fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus miþ ahmin izwaramma, broþrjus.
du Galatim gameliþ ist us Rumai.
EPH Incipit.0 Aipistaule Pawlaus du Aifaisium anastodeiþ.
EPH 1.1 Pawlus, apaustaulus Xristaus Iesuis þairh wiljan gudis, þaim weiham þaim wisandam in Aifaison jah triggwaim in Xristau Iesu.
EPH 1.2 ansts izwis jah gawairþi fram guda attin unsaramma jah fraujin Iesu Xristau.

EPH 1.3 þiuþiþs guþ jah atta fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus, izei gaþiuþida uns ana allai þiuþeinai ahmeinai in himinakundaim in Xristau. EPH 1.4 swaswe gawalida uns in imma faur gasatein fairƕaus, ei sijaima weihai jah unwammai in andwairþja is in frijaþwai.

EPH 1.5 fauragarairoþ uns du suniwe gadedai þairh Iesu Xristu in ina bi leikainai wiljins seinis, EPH 1.6 du hazeinai wulþaus anstais seinaizos, in þizaiei ansteigs was uns in þamma liubin sunau seinamma, EPH 1.7 in þammei habam faurbauht, fralet frawaurhte þairh bloþ is, bi gabein wulþaus anstais is, EPH 1.8 þoei ufarassau ganohida in uns in allai handugein jah frodein, EPH 1.9 kannjan unsis runa wiljins seinis bi wiljin, saei fauragaleikaida imma EPH 1.10 du fauragaggja usfulleinais mele, aftra usfulljan alla in Xristau, þo ana himinam jaþþo ana airþai

in imma, EPH 1.11 in þammei hlauts gasatidai wesum, fauragaredanai bi wiljin gudis þis alla in allaim waurkjandins bi muna wiljins seinis, EPH 1.12 ei sijaima weis du hazeinai wulþaus is þai faurawenjandans in Xristau, EPH 1.13 in þammei jah jus gahausjandans waurd sunjus, aiwaggeli ganistais izwaraizos, þammei galaubjandans gasiglidai waurþuþ ahmin gahaitis þamma weihin, EPH 1.14 izei ist wadi arbjis unsaris du faurbauhtai gafreideinais, du hazeinai wulþaus is.
